name: Kevani
description:
A top down pixel art stealth game. Your mission is to go floor by floor silently eliminating all enemies. If you are seen you will be shot, can you complete each level with only 5 lives?

Features:

Use your knife to kill enemies
Hit walls to lure enemies out
Stay away from enemy lights to avoid being seen
Cyberpunk pixel art style
3 different types of enemies, watch out for the AK-47!
If you like stealth games download it on the Play Store now!

The game took around 5 months to make and is built using LibGDX.
